description:
`berrybrew` can download, install, remove and manage multiple concurrent versions of Strawberry Perl for Windows. 

There is no [requirement](https://github.com/stevieb9/berrybrew#requirements) to have Strawberry Perl installed before using `berrybrew`.
summary: berrybrew: the perlbrew for Windows Strawberry Perl!
author: David Farrell
